text: could we get the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/personal-cms-access-key|personal access key> page more up front? it was hard to find in the docs and I couldn’t remember what it was called

Wish granted!

Under Developer Reference > CLI > Personal Access Keys
just ran `hs auth` in terminal btw… that was slick

My favorite commands:
```hs open --list```
I underuse it but it’s amazing

Would love if you could publish a HubSpot Project to a CMS page - like create a password protected page for customers outside of HubSpot - so you could work on a project with them collaboratively. Where you can cross things off the list - and they can as well...
Has anyone else received a request like this ??

I’d suggest creating an ideas forum post for this and linking to it from here so folks can upvote it.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/custom/page/page-id/ideaslandingpage>
